name: Tractor
description: A large, powerful truck with a driver's cab and a fifth wheel, designed to pull a trailer.

name: JCB
description: JCB has conjointly created, its name within the tractor world by manufacturing one among the primary such machines that options correct suspension and is capable of movement at speed on roads.

name: Lever
description: The lever consists of a long beam and a fulcrum, or pivot. The mechanical advantage of the lever depends on the ratio of the lengths of the beam on either side of the fulcrum.

name: Machine Guns
description: Machine gun, automatic weapon of small calibre that is capable of sustained rapid fire. Most machine guns are belt-fed weapons that fire from 500 to 1,000 rounds per minute and will continue to fire as long as the trigger is held back or until the supply of ammunition is exhausted.
